content.detailedDescription: Hi! this sunset sighting differs in that most of the orb pictures are usually round! leaving some to believe a possible reflection, lense flare, or glare!  this will defy that logic! why!  because close examination will exhibit a half orb! notice the "grove in the half orb* which is visible in all three consective decending pictiures. there were 5 in sequence. but i could only upload 3. so i chose the 3 that show the widest spread in a few seconds of quick picture shoot. there were more pix of it falling. the broken uniform orb with the grove! cannot be confused with a reflection or feedback of something "round!" unlike the usual round orbs. i have a similar posted pix of an orb, white splitting in half posted!. another orb transforming into four orbs, over a very sharp clear picture of a line chemtrail. gives clarity to the immediate area. proving it's not a blurry glich. so i feel this sequence of thre broken half orbs over whittier, give more proof of the odd anomalies. the direction angle never changed. please look closely at the exact formation of the cracked area, as it is consistant to the other falling sequential pictures. g.A. from whittier!
content.summary: This is a rare haf orb! and is falling sequential pix

content.detailedDescription: Chem trails have not been proven! also a cloud can cover the sun and lets you look directly at it sometimes. i didnt see anything at all in your photos, except a tree in the middle of the sun with some cool clouds around! if you do stare at the sun evential you will see dark spots because you will go blind!
content.summary: To garden grove california person reporting chem trails!

content.detailedDescription: Hi, while taking a sequence of around 8 pictures including short 2 minute video, a mass or small dark cloud was in sequential pictures; @4:09, 4;09, 4:09, 4:10! equals 4 sequential black small cloulds in front of sun.  with two vey small black clouds to the right. a third tiny! note. the fifth 4:10 picture was completely void of all three black cloud like entities.  then i ran a video 2 minutes. @4:11 to 4:12 no small black clouds at all in two minutes. the 6th picture at 4:14 void of cloud like mass in center of lower sun , now has an oval white orb! ! (first oval shaped i've photgrahed )  at right area where cloud mass was. question. is there a relationship of the cloud like dark spot , missing cloud, followed by an oval white orb total time less than 5 minutes from cloud mass to void to oval orb? just observing the orb phenominon. g.A. whittier
content.summary: Part two of last report. more pictures related. mass then orb relationship? calif

content.detailedDescription: Hi, while chemtrail shooting, and filming i got sequential shots and video from the same point and time. four or five had a "grey black uniform unchanging shape in four to five sequential still shots. the others that followed were void. no cloud could block the sun like this. for four seprarate shots without fading away, or changing. this appears solid? i've never seen anything quite like this before. i have video and backup pix to validate this sighting.   i believe there are ufo's that surround the sun's orbit! my personal guess g.A.  from whittier.
content.summary: Black mass or entiiy in front of sun appears as a cloud. impossible! to be cloud

content.detailedDescription: i was at work checking a building after making my round i went to get back in my truck when i looked to the east of my position and saw what at first i thought my have been a star. it was just past sun set and the even star was already up. which is what i thoutght i was seeing. but then the light begin to move south to north i then thought it might have been an aircraft[looked like the landing light of a plane] as there is a small air field near by and maf (midland airfield) about 25 land miles from where i was. i begin watching looking for marker lights[red / green anti-colesion] that would normal be on. i saw none of these. the object then made a slow trun to the east about this time at a higher alt. i saw an airplane. while watching the object after the trun it appeared to just fade out as if some one had trun off a dimmer switch.
content.summary: Witness what at first i thougth was a star.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home on the night of the sighting, i observed a bright light in the sky, like a star but lower and brighter.  it was still in the same place an hour later when i arrived and when i asked my husband to come outside to see something, he immediately told me that he had noticed it as well.  it stayed in the same part of the sky for several hours, but it moved quickly from side to side and seemed to come towards us and then recede.  we noted that it was in the opposite direction from the air force base.  i initially thought it was a star or satellite, or perhaps an airplane but its movements ruled out all of those possibilities.  i do not know how long it stayed there as we went indoors shortly thereafter.  a few weeks later i asked a friend about weather balloons and if they were ever launched from the air force base.  he wondered why i would ask such a thing and when i told him of our experience, he verified that others had also seen and reported the sighting and that he'd read about it in the newspaper.  the interesting thing is that my husband and i saw the same thing in the same part of the sky a few years ago.  i was not frightened but simply amazed, both times.  i have mentioned this only to a few friends and relatives, one of whom directed me to the mufon website.
content.summary: A star--like light darted from side to side and forward and back.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car sitting in park my brother was getting his groceries out the trunk he went into the house and then my daughter was yelling mommy she was sitting  in the front seat. next to me i look to my right we saw what look like a small.Triangle shape object 3 bright whites it was so close to us it was like 30 feet in the air and probably 20 feet away from us it just drove straight as it got behind the house it disappeared fast we heard  a slight sound coming from it at the time there was also a black helicopter that i just saw take off like 3 minutes before we saw the ufo the helicopter is a life light it came from allegheny general hospital we only got to see this object for 10 to 12 second only. this thing was very low and  when it went behind the house it disappeared
content.summary: Small triangle shape object bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Exploring bridgewater/ ma- saw chrome dome poking from trees- bright sun reflecting- after saw small shiny object quickly move to right, leaving a blur trail and then disappear/ as if it vanished.

i decided to go exploring parts of massachusetts with daughter during sunday afternoon on the fifth of february. just wanted to get out of house and explore further into ma to see what was in the opposite direction of where we frequent more often.

went through dighton, then taunton then raynham (ate in raynham) then continued driving through bridgewater. i kind of lost my way turning onto a side road. very rural area. lots of fields, trees, farming county, there were houses, but most the trees obstructed the view of most. long hidden driveways.

continued driving on this road (dont know the name of the street) & (was thinking of getting gps out if this road didnt take us back to the main road) and as i was driving (daughter in passenger side just looking around at scenery) i was looking further out at the road beyond in front of my car & noticed that the road sloped downward a bit and turned a few times (longer section of the road) i also noticed to my left, above tree tops a large dome shaped structure poking out of the tree tops. it was shiny reflective, reflecting the sun, it hurt my eyes. i was thinking to myself, wonder if we are driving up on a farm, which i was anticipating it to be right around the corner where the clustering of trees were as we approached. i was expecting to find a farmers silo on the other side when i passed the area. or was it a ufo? (it did cross my mind)

suddenly my daughter said "did you see that?! omg!" i asked, what am i supposed to be looking at? where are you looking? she was pointing toward the clearing of the sky which would have lined up with the road if you had drawn a straight line. but much higher up. the tree tops would have been much lower and rather on both sides. im not familiar on horizon measurements. 

"did you see that? omg?!" "what am i supposed to be looking at? what am i supposed to see? where are you looking at?!" she pointed her finger in the sky above the road the whole time never taking her eyes off. i could not see what she had seen, but none-the-less tried. i asked her, "what did you see?" she described it as a reflective surface disc like shape the size of a quarter (or a little less) if held out at arms length. she said it was there once second hover & left so quickly it made a blur streak and disappeared as if into thin air.

i quickly looked toward the tree tops to the left, we were coming up on the spot where i had seen the chrome dome right before my daughter had alerted me to look elsewhere, but at this time, i could not see it due to the elevation of the road dropping. we were rounding the corner so again, i was still expecting to see a farm on the other side. when we got to the other side (of the thick row of trees & beyond the curve of road), there was no farm. there was no silo. there was a large open field. no sign of anything but trees, a field...Then as continued on traveling...More trees, more fields, a few houses here and there. i just kept driving forward. never stopping to turn around and go back and drive the same route to see if there would still be a chrome dome or even pull over to get my gps out so we could start home from where we currently were. i kept driving.. wondering if what i saw right before what my daughter saw, was one of the same but at different altitudes. 

(we did make it to the main road and a exit to bring us back home & i did share to my daughter what i thought i saw & what it might have been. she said what she saw was similar, but much smaller. 

will we ever know? all i can say is wow.
content.summary: Exploring bridgewater/ ma- saw chrome dome poking from trees- bright sun reflecting- after saw small shiny object quickly move to right, leaving a blur trail and then disappear/ as if it vanished

Exploring bridgewater/ ma- saw chrome dome poking from trees- bright sun reflecting- after saw small shiny object quickly move to right, leaving a blur trail and then disappear/ as if it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: well we where sitting in front tv room looking out windo when we seen a bright lihgt growing with intencety as it moved around thin it whent super bright almost blinding we went out frount and object started rapidly changing directions as it was discharging what looked multen medal fire dpops first one then two then many droped from one side of craft well i say craft cause you could see its shaps it looked nothing ide ever seen when we first noticed it it was  the brightest star we ever seen so we went to see if it was a commet no it was not it was a for sure a ufo we watched it for over long perid of time long anuff to walk across street to get our freinds and show them they wehre as shocked as we where
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Acorn shape with a fire color on underside and droping small fire balls to one side

content.detailedDescription: On way home from work i noticed two bright orange lights towards the south of milton keynes between the houses. as i walked around the corner and took another look they seemed to be a bright unusual orange glow, not like a plane or anything i have seen in the sky before. as i walked up hill i kept looking back and noticed another. 3 perfectly spaced almost in a s formation. thought may be aircraft but as i got further up the hill toward the hub area of central milton keynes i couldnt help but keep looking back. then i noticed one dirctly above me, very high, as i looked back toward the three lights i had noticed first i saw 3 more in exactly the same "s formation" between the high level one on its own and the first group. perfectly spaced, no sound from engines or rotas, just almost hanging in the air, as i looked up at the single light it moved into the clouds and the lights dimmed and i could make out a grey ball like object then it either gained hight so couldnt see or went into the cloud cover. as i looked back the other six had gone. where or how so quick i do not know as i had a wide range of view of sky from central milton keynes to brickhill woods. aside from this i saw a grey almost transparent object about the size of a people carrier moving low over the main rail station oly 10 mins after seeing the lights. never seen anything like this before. am almost in shock at the moment. be great to know if anybody else witnessed this.
content.summary: Group of lights moving slowly in s type formation south to north

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i returned home from seeing a movie together on sunday night at about 7:00 pm on feb 5 2012. we live in a rural location and our house is 1/4 mile down a gravel road after turning off of a highway. we live just south of a small lake which has a row of homes about a 1/4 mile long stretching east to west. i pulled into the driveway right along the garage. it was dark and the yard light wasn't on. my daughter got out first as i rummaged thru the car to find whatever i needed to bring into the house with me. seconds later i heard my daughter yelling at me, "mom, mom, mom get out here!!!" at first i thought she was just cold and crabby that the door was locked and she wanted me to hurry up but she had raced back to the car and opened the door and yelled at me to get me out there. it's cold winter weather in february. i jumped out of the car and just east, to the right of us above the tree tops about 25 feet away and straight up, was a bright pure red light that produced a red glow down into the entire back yards of our neighbors. it was slightly foggy too which intensified the glow of the red. i hadn't seen this red glow driving down the road or sitting in my car because the garage blocked my view. my daughter's responce was, "mom...What is that?!?!" we stared at it sorta mesmorized because i have never seen anything like it before. my first reaction was that it looked like it was something with a bright light underneath hovering just above the tree tops and appeared to be moving away from us approximately 10 mph or so, just floating along. we both just stared at it and i was sorta freaked. i said i have no idea what it is. the brilliant glowing red light then turned to a white light. the white wasn't as intense. it was slightly foggy out so it really looked eerie. i heard voices chattering in a distance so my logical mind said to my daughter, "oh, its gotta be a firework spark just floating down or something." i really did have the spooks and we both dashed into the house. i immediately asked my mom, whom i live with, "did you hear any fireworks going off?" her responce was, "no. i didn't hear any noises. nothing. it's been quiet."  i then thought to myself, 'oh my god i think that was a ufo.' i felt a shudder go through me. that was the last we talked about it until three days later.

it was wednesday and i did my usual morning walk with my friend and our dogs. he said his brother had called him last night and told him that he and his friend saw a ufo. my friend works in the county jail as a sgt. and his brother wanted to know if anything was reported last sunday night. i asked him the details. he said his brother got a flat tire on his way home from ice fishing sunday night. he had pulled off the highway and saw this fire red light illuminating the trees all the way to the ground. it was hovering along the treetops. i freaked out. i interrupted his story and told him what my daughter and i had seen. it was the same night. i kept saying to him, oh my god i saw a ufo. we talked about the subject of ufo's during the whole walk. he said he'd give his brother my phone number so we could talk that night. 

his brother did call me and i found out that he and his friend had gotten their flat tire right on the highway near my road. they had pulled off onto my road to change their flat tire. i did recalled seeing a car parked as i turned onto my road that sunday night on our way home from the movie theater. my daughter and i had seen this red light moving away from our end of the neighborhood while they had seen it coming towards them at the opposite end of the row of houses near the highway. anyway, he had called me that night so we could talk directly about the details of what we each had seen that night. from their standpoint he could see the trees and the ground all lit up from the bright red light. he said it looked as if this ufo was scanning the ground as it moved east along the back yards. he said it was so bright red that if someone was standing under the glowing red light that they easily could have been seen. just as it got to the end of the homes by the highway the bright red light turned white. that's what my daughter and i had seen too. that's when we ditched into the house. he then said it turned directions and moved north along the highway up around the east side of the lake. they watched it until they no longer could see it which was approximately a mile or two up the highway. 

we both had concluded that this must have been a craft of some type emitting this red light. you could actually see the light which was a round red light that produced the glowing red which illuminated the entire back yards as it slowly moved horizontally across the tops of the trees. then...It turned white. that's when we had gone into the house and from their end they had seen it turn north and continue on. it never altered its elevation from their standpoint. from ours, because i wasnt quite sure what it was, i had thought it might have been a spark slowly floating down when in actuality after hearing how they saw it floating across towards them, it was actually slowly moving away from us. i can say it was fascinating experience to say the least. it was incredible to hear from someone who had seen it from the other end of the neigborhood. i have not asked any other neighbors if they witnessed the red illumination. but i may because i heard voices that night. i don't think i could have heard the other witnesses talking because they were a quarter mile up the road. it was quite the coincedence that my friends brother was there that night. otherwise i think this sighting would have been forgotten and not documented. 

i feel exhilarated from the experience. i really feel that it was a craft of some type even though the red illuminated light and slight fog and the dark night prevented us from seeing what the red light was fixed upon. it had to be fixed upon something. i really can't stop thinking about it and i've been on the internet trying to see if any such red lighted craft has been witnessed before. we also felt like 'they' must have been scanning the ground and looking for something or someone. 

i told my daughter about the other witnesses and that they believe whole heartedly it was a ufo. all she said to me was "i told you!! you should listen to me more mom!!" i guess at first sight i was so freaked i had to logically make it out to be a spark from a firework but we heard no booming or popping. i asked my daughter, who is age 15, how she felt when she first saw the glowing red light. she said she was really scared and that's why she was frantically calling for me to get out of the car. she thinks its was a ufo. i do and also the other two witnesses.
content.summary: The bright red light illuminated entire back yards of neighborhood as it took a strate path across the back yards above treetops. at end of homes by the highway the red light turned white then another witness said it changed directions and continued north

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on my sofa in my living room, when i then noticed th
creature playing kinda peek a boo ! 
when i noticed it i screamed it got starstartled  and his hand magically apearedhe teleported me to my room and changed time scenarios to make it seenm like it wete mornong.
content.summary: I was sitting on my sofa he was hiding behind the rocking chair playing peek a boo. when i saw it i screamed he teleportted me to my bed.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light over the golf course around 7pm that had not been there before. again at 10pm, the light had moved closer to directly overhead. there was no sound.There was a triangle shape around the object light with many different colors coming from it. many bright blue lights twinkled around it also.
content.summary: Bright light in sw over golf course

content.detailedDescription: In my report of feb 09, i indicated the increase of activity over edmonton. today one of my co-workers brought a 12 mega pixel camera to try out. i went outside at 7 am and within 5 minutes i had about 24 photos. sample attached.
content.summary: Went outside with the intent to photograph ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on egg harbor rd  and i noticed a bright white light . at first i thought it was a plane making a descent into phl., but the object did not move. then the object got brighter and more white and changed from white to pink and started to pulsate . when i stopped at a traffic light i stated to observe the object more , i looked for a point of reference  like a tree and a rooftop to see if the object moved. it did not . then as i was watching it it vanished
content.summary: Object hovered and pulsates for about 15 min then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On february 4, 2012  (and according to my very short video's time 2154 eastern time)  i went to get my phone that was sitting near the living room window,  it was then when i noticed a group of red lights outside on the eastern side of the town. i informed my wife of the sighting and run outside to the back porch. she soon followed behind me with camera on hand. the group of red bright solid lights were all spread across the horizon not flying anywhere (more like peppering the sky),  no particular formation, but seemingly hovering for a minute or two before start ascending straight up in unison.  no engine or other sound was heard .There was an overcast and soon after the start of the ascend they disappeared behind the clouds.  we noticed that they must have been at different altitudes since they disappeared at different intervals with the closest one to us, last.  the encounter lasted around 2 minutes. however, i don't know how long they were there before i noticed them.  so i cannot tell if they had descended thru the overcast and sat there for a while and went back up. or if they had been flying under the overcast and sat there before a saw them, then ascended thru the overcast. all i know is when i spotted then, they were not ascending or descending, they were hovering spread thru the horizon.  the reason i know they were spread thru the horizon is that the closest one to us was bigger than the other farther away.
  my wife brought the digital camera with her but i was unable to take pictures because the camera kept on trying to focus on the tall tree in front of us and it did not let me take the picture in spite of the fact that i press the shutter button many times.  i had my ipod touch and starting videotaping. i could not see anything thru my ipod's screen so i assumed that for some reason it wasn't recording so i stop (came to find out later, it had recorded some). the expletive you hear is me frustrated with not been able to document the event. i counted from this very short video and from what i recall at least 10 of the red bright lights. 
  the event is driving us crazy. i sent an email to the local paper asking if someone else reported them to the local or county authorities but  i have not received any response. 
  last, a word on the video. it's better if you viewed on a computer monitor with lights off. where the video stops you can count the other lights, keep in mind some of then are not visible due the tall tree in front of the lights.
content.summary: Sighting of a group of (approximate 10 or more lights) hovering red lights at different altitudes

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out onto balcony at night and observed a stationary pulsating light in the western sky at approximately 2:45 am. within a minute i saw a much closer airplane traveling north from south. i often watch the sky and starts in the area since i have a wonderful view. it was a clear night sky with no light pollution. i went back inside and tried to use my video camera and regular camera however i could not get a good focus due to distance of object which caused me to try and maximum zoom which i could not steady and locate in lens. using my binoculars i watched object until it vanished from sight in a clear night sky, unobstructed view. it simply blinked out and it was gone. during the entire sighting, the object appeared as a red/white/orange light. since initial visual was gained, the object moved in a reverse closed number 4 pattern, starting at the lowest point, moving to the highest point, then lowering on a diagonal half way back down and to the right, the it moved horizontaly going south, through the path of the upward movement... then it blinked out and it was gone. this entire sighting took approximately 15 minutes in total. i am on some of the highest ground in my area and i did not have to look up to see these lights. i only had to look west. based on my location and my percieved distance from the object, i believe whatever caused these lights was off the west coast of california... exactly due west of richmond, ca. these lights might have been seen from people closer to the coast had they been looking also. they were not over the sf bay... they were much further west than that because i can see the bay clearly.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary pulsating lights seen due west, then multiple direction path until it just vanished into thin air.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished taking a shower around 7 am the sky was clear and the sun was shinning bright for the morning it was very clear day. i looked up in the air directly south about 2 miles from the newport beach ocean shoreline and see about 500 feet above me a spinning red egg oval shaped spear spinning craft was flashing brightly different colors of bright lights or they could have been re directed light from the sunlight not sure. i ran outside took about a min or two and looked for the object in the air to my surprise it was spinning alot faster and had ascended out over the ocean and was up about a 1000 feet i showed it to my roommate then about a min later lost sight of it. the ufo was red sphere egg shaped and spinning around slowly at first the object was on a path upward and going south toward the ocean it did seem to be spinning faster as it got higher and was really a very bright light it seemed to be leaving a light emissions trial it was almost like a christmas tree ornament in every way
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red oval egg shaped sphear floating or hovering slow spinning and flashing bright lights or reflecting sun light emmision trail assending

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were driving on bob hope drive in ranch mirage, ca, three nights ago (2/7/12) and saw a craft right over bob hope drive.  it was at around 6:30 to 6:45 p.M. and the road was full of cars.  i was driving in shock, with my eyes on the flying object.  i kept asking my sister if she agrees that it's a flying saucer type of craft and it's absolutely unbelievable.  she agreed.  i almost got hysterical but tried to hold myself back from screaming in disbelief because my 3 year old was with us and also because i didn't want my sister to make fun of me later.  it was so close to us and to the ground that i could have counted all the white, round lights.  it had one light on top (i saw the red light in the middle as protruding from an dome or peek at the top of the craft).  the bottom of the craft was not visible for most of the sighting except for a few seconds.  it appeared to be in the shape of a cone.  the bright, round lights along the circular edge of the craft turned on and off erratically.  it started moving further away and we kept trying to follow it.  it took me only about a minutes or so to turn right onto a side road so i can stop away from the busy traffic.  by then, the craft was all the way over the mountains towards joshua tree (?).  it was a little strange that it had gotten so far away even though it was seemingly flying quite slow.  i wouldn't call it flying.  it was moving in a circular motion, like a frizbee.  as we were stopped and continued to watch it for a few minutes, it came back over an area in front of us.  i believe it's an empty desert area along hwy 10.  at this point, we were on a secluded road and my sister was a little frightened and joked about abductions.  i wasn't brave enough to try to follow it any longer.  it got further and further away in an easterly direction.  it's absolutely unbelievable and very frustrating that no one else reported a sighting and there was no coverage on the local news.  i guess people are either skeptical or embarrassed to report it.  what we saw resembles the videos from recent sightings on the internet from russia, san rafael, ca, and uk.  someone also forwarded a link to a website to me where i found a report of a sighting over the same area (hwy. 10 in palm desert) two days before our sighting.  someone has commented on it and described a sighting on the night of our sighting (feb 7th) from his house in palm desert, ca.  please be certain that what i saw was a ufo in the shape of a flying saucer at pretty close range and very obvious.  i am absolutely certain that it was not a weather balloon, blimp, cloud formation/aura, airplane, helicopter, etc.  it looked and behaved like every flying saucer i have seen throughout the years in sci-fi movies.  if it was a new, secret military craft in the shape of a flying saucer, i would be very impressed by it because it continuously stopped mid air.  

i know i'm not allowed to post links to other websites but the two reports over palm desert area on the night of our sighting and two days before our sighting should not be overlooked.  if you decide to contact me, i can forward the link to you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A very close range sighting of a craft in the shape of a flying saucer, with white round lights along the edge of it's circular shape and one larger red light at the center which protruded from a dome or peek shape at the very center.

content.detailedDescription: It starts as 2 lights in the sky above yucca. one light disapers and re aperes 10-15 miles away. then the process reverses. the lights disapers and reapear over the mountain range to the east and then back to the south east near havasu. when the lights disaper thet slowly fade out. this went on for 1.5-2 hrs.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on 195 the object looked to be a few miles away to the east.  first i thought it was a star, then i thought it was a plane, then i thought it was a helicopter.  once it got over 195 it followed the highway going west.  as it was approaching the highway i could tell it was not a helicopter.  as it got over me i could clearly see a large triangle shaped object with a metal surface and 5 large white lights.
content.summary: Triangle, 5 large white lights, one small green & one small red flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
I was alone at my parents house in the black hills of south dakota a little after 8:40 pm on thursday, february 9th. i was watching television when the dog began to act anxious, which i interpreted as a need to relieve herself. i let her out onto the back porch but she did not run off into the trees or leave my side. i stepped out from under the porch roof because i saw light emanating from the area, above the canyon, behind my parents house.

i saw two spheres, one blue and one green, that i, at first thought, were vehicles moving around on the hill about a mile away from the house on the far side of the canyon. after a few moments i realized that the angle was wrong and the lights were too high in the sky and too close to be on the ground. the trees behind our house obscured my view and i could not tell what they were in the distance. 

we live in a very secluded area and when you stand outside you can hear the sound of engines if there are trucks or snow mobiles but there was absolutely no sound, which was very unsettling.

i brought the dog back in and went up into the tower at the house to use the telescope to try and see what these were. with the telescope i struggled to keep focused on them and i could not pick out any distinguishing features. they still just looked like fuzzy, floating, glowing discs or spheres. they then moved behind the cover of the roof and and went downstairs again to watch them through a window.

 the dog was still quite uneasy and was staying very close to my leg. the lights had crossed from being across from the eastern corner of the house to the western end. the blue light was slightly higher than the green. they appeared to come lower and closer to the house and then move away and over the a hill. 

the wind was quite powerful up here today so it is very hard to say whether not they were moving against the wind or faster than reasonable. i am at a loss as to what i saw. i have never had an experience like this before and i am a devout skeptic, however i am stumped and a little freaked out. 

i would much prefer a reasonable explanation to having seen an alien craft. i would even prefer an experimental aircraft or something.
content.summary: I witnessed two hovering glowing spheres, one blue and one green, in the canyon behind my parents house. they hovered and drifted.

content.detailedDescription: i saw what i first thought was a plane because we live near the airport & see planes all the time.  it flashed across the sky very fast & my first thought was that i've never seen a plane move that fast before.  then i realized it wasn't a plane.  i saw an extremely bright circle of light.  it stopped in the sky & i could see a silver or gray ring around it but no lights were on that part of it.  the whole center was a bright white light.  it moved quickly, hovered, moved around in a circle & then looped around & hovered again. after it hovered at the last spot, it's light intensified & then it just disappeared. - it did not accelerate out of sight or drop down - it was just gone. there was no noise.  i was very excited to be witnessing it.  afterwards i felt tense & kind of aggitated & my stomach muscles are still tight.  i know what i saw but today i questioned in my mind how i could have witnessed something like that.  i also have a sense of loss & have cried for no reason that i can think of....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 1 object that was circular in shape. it had a silver or gray ring around a very big bright white light.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of feb.7th 2012 i went outside to look at the full moon. i noticed a very bright object to the north-west that seemed to hover and flicker as if spinning. after watching for about 5 minutes all of a sudden a 'fire ball' shot from this object. i went inside to get a camera to try to photograph this object. i had was a sony sure shot 8 meg. to try to get a picture. i took several as i tried to zoom in closer to this bright light. 

to my surprise when i downloaded the pictures to my computer i was amazed to see that one of the pictures looked like some type of craft,round in shape with a bulging center,the color of the center was green. there were clouds in the area but i was still able to get a nice photo. this object hovered as if 'hanging around' for several hours and just disappeared. i wasn't scared as i have met several people in this field and i just wanted to document this object.

i am told that i live in a 'hot bed' for anomalous activity, so i am always looking up when time permits. i am happy to report that looking up and paying attention seems to have paid off with this strange photo. i have no idea what it is,but i do know it is not a plane,remote toy,hot air balloon,etc. hopefully someone else is paying attention in my area or better still someone can take my uploaded photo and decipher this object.

i really don't think we are alone in this world as i have witnessed many strange anomalies in my area for the past several years. is this some type of craft,satellite? i don't have the answers,but for those who are sky watchers i hope you enjoy.

peace and blessing's,
starr
content.summary: I've noticed a bright hovering object that comes many nights over my home since the 26th of jan.2012.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I doubt if my information would really be of use to anyone.  though someone writing a new book might find it of value.  my mother, sister and i have all seen more ufos than can be listed here.  differnt shapes, sizes and throughout our lives.  one, my mother saw human men in street clothing staring down out of a window.  i saw this ufo as well as did my sister and father.  as is commonly reported, we each have differing memories.  this went on throughout my childhood and followed me into adulthood until i was about 34.

i recall one night that ended my visitations when i was in bed asleep.  i awoke, paralyzed and found the room bathed in blue light.  these small creatures that to me looked a little like trolls or something surrounded my bed.  then a tall creature appeared and i recall remembering him and thought "you again".  the next thing i knew, i was floating over my bed after he directed the smaller ones to take me.  i rose over my bed, floating as they guided me through the double glass doors off my bedroom, out on the balcony which was shielded by bullet proof glass for sound abatement.  there was no way for anyone to get off that balcony without breaking the glass.  yet, i passed through it, hovering over the parking lot over which was a saucer shaped craft.  i was amazed that in downtown mission viejo, california that no one took notice.  the next thing i knew, i was in a room bathed in intense white light with several of the tall creatures around me.  they did something to me, taking a sample of sperm (i am transgender).  suddenly, they seemed concerned and the one i recognized came in and they told him something.  he was upset though there were no outward signs.  it was like i knew what he was thinking and he was mad!  he told the others they couldn't use me anymore.  i was full of both joy and wanted to rub it in.  i remember thinking to them ha ha!  you won't be bothering me anymore.  the next thing i remembered i was back in my room in my bed.  while i've seen many more ufos, i can't report anymore abductions.

i can't speak for my mother or sister.  but since my mother now lives here within 70 miles of me, we visit frequently and she's told me many stories.  i thought this might be of some value.  i didn't bother filling out much of this form as it seemed irrelevant.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.shape: Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Mulitple sightings throughout my life including abduction.

content.detailedDescription: More great web cam pictures of the ufos i see over nj/nyc...Watch the skies..They are here my friends...Marko333 :-) !!!
content.summary: Look ufos over nj/nyc hudson river

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were coming back from town at 5:33 december 24, 2011 we were just sitting in the car talking.  and everytime i'm out at night i always look out for ufos because i am a strong beliver in those type of things.  then i see an object from a far that doesnt have the color patterns a normal plane has, so i asked her if it was a ufo and she said i don't know but keep watching it so i did.  as we got closer i kept getting the feeling that it wasnt a plane.  we just basically were riding along with it for maybe 5 mintutes. and my sister was driving and trying to watch the obect at the same time.  so she was swerving in the road and i took my eyes if the craft for 2 seconds to make sure we wernt going to crash and it had changed shape it now had red and white lights along the edge instead of green ones. and as soon as that happend my sister started crying and saying a few curse words, and i felt completely nauseous and scared.  then the craft picks up speed turns left and by this time it was pretty much right above us but a little more to the left like over this empty field along that road and it was hovering and underneath it were three bright rectaguler white lights.  since it was hovering we drove past it then we qucikly turned aroun on the nearest road and within two mintues the craft was gone. and i have no idea how sincce it was hovering when we passed it and the sky was very clear that night. then at midnight the next morning i woke up vomiting. also three nights before witnessing the object i had a dream about witnessing one. and i would love to know if it was a coincidence or not.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular craft eith at first green lights around each edge then after the change red lights along the edge and at the very bottom the were three bright white rectangles
